title: [TFT] Teamfight Tactics Tournament on 24th of August - Open Ranks - RP Prizing
body:
Hey all, my Discord server called the No Sleep Palace are running a Teamfight Tactics tournament called the No Sleep Palace TFT Cup. It will be a 32 player Battle Royale style tournament. The schedule and format are explained in more detail below. If you're interested in signing up, please see the links down the bottom of the post! There are only 32 spots left so get in quick.

_**Format**_
Essentially, the format we'll be running with will be a Group Stage format, essentially, 32 players will be seeded into 4 groups of 8 players, for simplicity, we'll call them Groups A to D. All the groups will play 1 game and the bottom 4 of each group are eliminated, after the game, Group A and Group B will combine into another group of 8, meaning C and D will also follow-suit for another game. After that game is played, we'll have reached the final stage after we eliminate, yet again, the bottom 4 players in each group. The winner of the final stage will then be declared the No Sleep Palace TFT Cup Champion.

_**Schedule**_
The tournament is scheduled for Saturday the 24th of August at 3:00 PM AEST, below is a estimated schedule for the event.
Round of 32 - 3:00 PM AEST
Round of 16 - 3:40 PM AEST
Final Stage - 4:20 PM AEST
Conclusion of Event - 5:00 PM AEST

_**Signing Up**_
All players must be in the Discord to receive updates regarding the tournament, the discord link can be found [here](https://discord.gg/2d52A7x). The link to the Battlefy to sign up is [here](https://battlefy.com/no-sleep-palace-tournaments/no-sleep-palace-tft-cup-s1/5d4bd84a0886f116aace1c6a/info?infoTab=details). _**NOTE** - We will only be using the Battlefy to seed groups and to register competitors, at the start of the event, we'll no longer need the Battlefy and all updates will go through the Discord announcements channel._

Thank you all for your time!
- Zach, Co-Owner of NSP.

Discord - https://discord.gg/2d52A7x
Battlefy - https://battlefy.com/no-sleep-palace-tournaments/no-sleep-palace-tft-cup-s1/5d4bd84a0886f116aace1c6a/info?infoTab=details
